about_the_game:
Tactic Legends is a revolutionary card game that combines strategy, skill, and a touch of luck. Our game introduces a unique collection of cards and innovative mechanics that will captivate both new and experienced players.

Tactic Legends is an exhilarating online turn-based card game where strategy and skill are your greatest allies. Engage in intense battles against players worldwide, and prove your mettle by unlocking and collecting powerful cards from all collections to complete your ultimate decks.

Collections


🔥 Fire Kingdom
Fire Kingdom contains amazing flaming cards which will burn their enemies
Fire Kingdom have all type of cards but specially have Bond Ability Cards

❄️ Frost Kingdom
Frost Kingdom have all the strong and Intense fighter who used to fight in most difficult conditions
Frost Kingdom specially have Spy Ability cards

🌳 Jungle Kingdom
Jungle Kingdom have most stealth and bloody jungle fighters
Jungle Kingdom specially have ReviveAbility cards

😈 Elves Kingdom
Elves Kingdom have the most magical and scary fighters
Elves Kingdom specially have Muster Ability cards

Card Properties

Each card in Tactic Legends is assigned points that contribute to your overall strength in battle. Some cards come with unique abilities, adding an extra layer of strategy and excitement. Use these abilities wisely to gain the upper hand and outsmart your opponents.

some of some abilities are like these :

Bond Ability
Bond ability will be activated at least with 2 of same card ,Bond ability multiply each bond card points with total card amount


Muster Ability
Cards with muster ability will get all cards of the same clan in your hand and in your deck


Morale Ability
ards with morale ability will add one point to all cards in the same row


Horn Ability
Horn Card will dublicate the points of the cards in the row that used in
